This program is a step by step progression beginning with mustuse measurement in 1983, progressing to a bland and grade insensitive Instrument in 84 and a chemical analysis machine in 1986. paragraphs.content: BROWN & WILLIAMSON TOBACCO CORPORATION CAPITAL BUDGET PROJECT
1 ] Maintenance of Existing Business :selected: :unselected: 20 Expansion of Existing Business

There is a need to make on line measurements of chemical comprents, including nicisture. This program is a step by step progression beginning with mustuse measurement in 1983, progressing to a bland and grade insensitive Instrument in 84 and a chemical analysis machine in 1986. Future work will include reactions, where ULTRA violet must be delected with a grating imuchement peter .
This development will allow much buther control of montre & chemical comprents on a real time basis, at with the GUT AND MAEN operations - Thereby informing quality .
